articles.title: Broadway legend Stephen Sondheim, whose work transformed musical theater, dead at 91 - Reuters
articles.description: Broadway composer and lyricist Stephen Sondheim, who helped American musical theater evolve beyond pure entertainment and reach new artistic heights with such works as "West Side Story," "Into the Woods" and "Sweeney Todd," died early Friday at the age of 91,…

articles.title: West Side Story lyricist Stephen Sondheim dies aged 91 - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Stephen Sondheim, the songwriter who reshaped the American musical theatre with his intelligent lyrics and use of evocative melodies, has died aged 91.
articles.content: Stephen Sondheim, the songwriter who reshaped the American musical theatre in the second half of the 20th century with his intelligent, intricately rhymed lyrics, his use of evocative melodies and hi… [+14145 chars]

articles.title: The first carbon dioxide cold trap on the moon was confirmed-Mis-aisa-The - MIS Asia
articles.description: According to a recent report by the physicist organization network, after decades of research, American scientists have confirmed for the first time that there is a cold trap that may contain solid carbon dioxide on the moon.

articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.title: Shake the habit of spending too long sitting, your mental health will thank you - Malay Mail

articles.content:
Scientists find that sitting more is linked to increased feelings of depression and anxiety. Picture courtesy of eclipse_images / Getty Images
